text:
Hi Team,

We are integrating a new application and as part we need a load balancing of two tomcat servers from apache web server instance.

To load balance across the two tomcat servers, in order to maintain affinity /session state), below is tried:

ProxyPass /PROD balancer://mycluster/PROD stickysession=JSESSIONID|jsessionid nofailover=On
<Proxy balancer://mycluster>
  BalancerMember http://XXXXXXX.enterprisenet.org:XXXXX
  BalancerMember http://XXXXXX.enterprisenet.org:XXXXX
</Proxy>
ProxyPassReverse /PROD balancer://mycluster


But while trying to bring the instance after the above change, we are getting 'ProxyPass Can't find 'byrequests' lb method'. I goggled and seems that i need “mod_lbmethod_byrequests.so” to b included. 

Can you please help us in resolving this issue? if needed how can i get this module?


Thanks,
Sandeep Kumar S
creator: sandeep.s.kumar.ap@nielsen.com
covener@gmail.com
text:
Bugzilla is for reporting bugs, not requesting support. 

Try a user discussion list: http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html
dependency fixed in trunk by jim: r1428916
creator: covener@gmail.com
covener@gmail.com
text: of course for this particular bug report -- you've got to load and choose a load balancing algorithm (e.g. with ProxySet)
